name: 4.5.0-beta.3
releaseNotes:
- Added the new educational channels Coursera, TED  in Browser mode
- Adding, removing and sorting channels is now supported
- Now you can pin the playlist to the launching page
- Optimized the preference settings of the Incognito Mode
- Reduced the startup time of the application
- Enhanced the compatibility of certain MKV format videos
<!---->
- 浏览器模式新增教育类 Coursera、TED 频道
- 浏览器模式可自定义增减频道和排序
- 可以将播放列表保存到启动页面上
- 优化了无痕模式的偏好设置选项
- 优化了软件的启动速度
- 提高了对部分MKV格式视频的兼容性
